com.estimote.sdk

Class SecureRegion

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.estimote.sdk.Region
      • com.estimote.sdk.SecureRegion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable

    public class SecureRegion
extends Region
    Defines a secure region based on device's proximity to a beacons which has enabled Secure UUID. Region is defined by proximity UUID, major and minor numbers of targeting beacons. All of those can be nulls which means wildcard on that field. Read more @see What security features does Estimote offer? How does Secure UUID work?

    • Constructor Detail

      • SecureRegion

        public SecureRegion(java.lang.String identifier,
            java.util.UUID proximityUUID,
            java.lang.Integer major,
            java.lang.Integer minor)
        Parameters:
        identifier - A unique identifier for a region. Cannot be null.
        proximityUUID - Proximity UUID of beacons. Can be null. Null indicates all proximity UUIDs.
        major - Major version of the beacons. Can be null. Null indicates all major versions.
        minor - Minor version of the beacons. Can be null. Null indicates all minor versions.
